title: The Silly Squirrels and the Backwards Tuesday Machine
author: Claude
description: When Nutty, Mama, and Papa wake up to find thank-you notes for things they haven't done and trophies for discoveries they didn't make, they realize time is running backwards! Join them as they build the most ridiculous machine ever to investigate the chaosâ€”complete with disco balls, jellybeans, fizzy cola, and an explosion that makes everything make sense (kind of).

chapters.title: The Day That Started at the End
The Investigation That Makes Absolutely No Sense
Building the Machine That's Already Built But Also Isn't
The Most Explosive, Backwards, Forwards, Sideways, Inside-Out Conclusion Ever
